element.name: Firstseed of Heior
element.description:
The Firstseed of Heior — Wondrous Item, legendary (requires attunement).
Timeless Vitality. While attuned to the Seed, your natural lifespan is doubled and you no longer show physical signs of aging. You are immune to disease and cannot be aged magically.
Constitution of the Eternal. Your Constitution score becomes 19 while you are attuned to the Seed. This has no effect if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.
Unrelenting Resilience. Once per day, the first time you would drop to 0 hit points as a result of damage, instead drop to 1 hit point.
Siphoning Strikes. Once per day, you may empower your melee attacks for 1 round with life‑draining energy. During this round, you heal hit points equal to half the damage you deal with melee weapon attacks.
Aura of Renewal. You emanate a 10‑foot aura in which you and creatures of your choice are unaffected by the Curse of Dessication.
Verdant Cantrips. You learn the Druidcraft and Thorn Whip cantrips. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these.
Seed Spells. While attuned to the Seed, you may cast each of the following spells once per day without expending a spell slot. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells:
1st — Create or Destroy Water, Detect Poison and Disease, Purify Food and Drink, Speak with Animals
2nd — Gust of Wind, Spike Growth, Wither and Bloom
3rd — Plant Growth, Speak with Plants, Blight
4th — Aura of Purity, Stone Shape
5th — Greater Restoration
